product_name: Dynafit TLT Radical FT Randonee Bindings with 130mm Brakes
long_description: Dynafit TLT Radical FT randonee bindings are the solution for hard-charging backcountry skiers who log lots of miles skinning up mountains to ski couloirs, drops cliffs and float powder.
short_description: Dynafit TLT Radical FT randonee bindings are the solution for hard-charging backcountry skiers who log lots of miles skinning up mountains to ski couloirs, drops cliffs and float powder.
